purpose: GOLDEN REFERENCE for Kotlin migration patterns - use exportVendor as teaching example
usage: When implementing ANY operation in Kotlin, scan this reference FIRST to learn patterns

goldenExample.status: COMPLETE - Use as reference for all future Kotlin migrations
goldenExample.why: First operation migrated from Java to Kotlin - demonstrates all key patterns

pathNote: Use Windows paths (C:\) - MCP server runs as .exe, NOT WSL paths (/mnt/c/)

architecture.description: Kotlin driver extends Java driver, overrides methods one at a time via TDD
architecture.delegation: All non-overridden methods automatically delegate to Java parent
